ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:0.5_0: 12. The training rule on entirely black
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī in the hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six were having blankets made entirely of black wool.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.3_0: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.4_0: “How can the Sakyan ascetics have blankets made entirely of black wool? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.5_0: The monks heard those people complaining,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.6_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.7_0: “How can the monks from the group of six have blankets made entirely of black wool?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.8_0: After criticizing those monks in many ways, they told the Buddha ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.12_0: “... Foolish men, how can you have blankets made entirely of black wool?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.14_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.15.1_0: ‘If a monk has a blanket made entirely of black wool, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.6_0: there are two kinds of black:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.9_0: it is put out in charge of building work.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.11_0: If he makes the blanket, or has it made, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.12_0: When he gets the sitting-blanket, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.13_0: It should be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.14_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.16_0: ‘Venerables, this blanket which I had made entirely of black wool is to be relinquished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.17_0: I relinquish them to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.20_0: ‘I give these tonics back to you.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.21.1_0: If she finishes what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.22_0: If she has others finish what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.23_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.24_0: If she has others finish what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.25_0: If she makes one or has one made for the benefit of someone else, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.26_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.28_0: if she makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.31_0: The second rule, the training rule on entirely black, is finished.
